#labels Procedures
Increments the kernel reference count. 

Interface to OpenCL [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/clRetainKernel.html clRetainKernel].

=== Interface ===

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clRetainKernel(kernel, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_kernel), intent(inout) :: kernel
  integer,         intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clRetainKernel
</code>
